p: The total phenolic content of specimens was evaluated utilising the Folinâ€“Ciocalteu assay [ 43] with slight modifications [ 44]. The total phenolics absorbance was determined at 765 nm with the use of a Jenway UV/Vis 6405 spectrophotometer (Jenway, Chelmsford, UK). The findings are reported as gallic acid equivalents (GAE/g specimens).
